Ambassador Recognition

Invitation-Only Leadership Program

Ambassadors are approved lead volunteers who earn recognition points for coordinating rescues, hosting events, and managing community outreach

Bronze

0-100 pts

3 rescues

Digital badge, Community access

Silver

100-500 pts

10 rescues

Affiliate links, Priority support, Rescue + Marketplace

Gold

500-1500 pts

25 rescues

Featured stories, Event hosting, Referral bonuses

Platinum

1500+ pts

50+ rescues

Franchise partnership, Regional lead, Early access

Ambassador Program

Invitation Only - Leadership Role

What Ambassadors Get:

  • Everything in Community (Free)
  • Access to Admin & Rescue Dashboards
  • Coordinate Local Rescue Requests
  • Host Donation Drives & Events

 

  • Early Franchise Pilot Participation
  • Ambassador Badge & Recognition
  • Dedicated Support from ReFURRM HQ

Ambassadors are approved lead volunteers managing outreach and pilot programs
